#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t=0;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t>0)
	{
		int n=0,w=0;
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&w);
		int arr[1001];
		bool subset[1001][1001];
		for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)
		{
			subset[i][0]=true;
		}
		for(int i=0;i<=w;i++)subset[0][i]=false;
		subset[0][0]=true;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			
			for(int j=1;j<=w;j++)
			{
				if(subset[i-1][j]==true)
				{
					subset[i][j]=true;
					
				}
				else
				{
					if(arr[i]<=j) 
					{
						if(subset[i-1][j-arr[i]]==true) subset[i][j]=true; 
						else subset[i][j]=false;
					}
					else
					{
						subset[i][j]=false;
					}
				}
				
			}//end of the inner loop
			
			
			
		
		}//end of the for loop
	if(subset[n][w]==true)cout<<"1\n";
	else cout<<"0\n";
		t--;
	}//end of t he while ;loop
	return 0;
}
